position.marginalia_text: Vide h[a]ec verius posita, supra fo. 8.v.

marginalia.translation: See these placed more properly, above, folio 8 verso.

position.marginalia_text: R[ati]o quare [hic - deleted] minuu[n]t minuta hic posita, ha[e]c est, quod cu[m] in bisextili anno integru[m] addicunt die[m] pro quater 5 h[orae] 55 minutis et 20 secundis, cum efficia[n]t [....] [prete - deleted] horas 23 m[inutae] 41 sec. 20, desunt igitur singulis diebus eius anni intercalare[m] die[m] seque[n]tib[us] minuta 18 secunda 40, et similiter singulis bissextilib[us]

marginalia.translation: The reason why the minutes placed here diminish, this is because when in a leap year they add a whole day for four times, five hours, 55 minutes and 20 seconds, since they accomplish [...] 23 hours, 41 minutes and 20 seconds, therefore they lack the intercalcated day for the single days of this year, by the following 18 minutes, 40 seconds and similarly on single leap years.
